bill_title: Honoring the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf team for its outstanding performance and victory in the 2019 State B Golf Championship.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf team for its outstanding performance and victory in the 2019 State B Golf Championship. WHEREAS, the 2019 James Valley Christian High School Golf Team won the South Dakota State Class B Boys Golf Championship by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, and dedication to excellence both on and off the golf course; and WHEREAS, the 2019 South Dakota State High School Championship golf meet was held at the Hillcrest Country Club in Yankton, South Dakota; and WHEREAS, the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf Team had four golfers that placed in the top 70 out of 111 entries: Austin Boomsma won first place with a total score of 153 strokes; Carter Wells placed third with a total score of 158 strokes; Ryan Stahl placed twenty-eighth with a total score of 179 strokes; and Jevin Goertz placed sixty-first with a total score of 192 strokes; and WHEREAS, the James Valley Christian High School Varsity Golf Team received superior coaching and outstanding leadership from head coach Phelan Stahl: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf Team and its coaches on a great season.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf team for its outstanding performance and victory in the 2019 State B Golf Championship. WHEREAS, the 2019 James Valley Christian High School Golf Team won the South Dakota State Class B Boys Golf Championship by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, and dedication to excellence both on and off the golf course; and WHEREAS, the 2019 South Dakota State High School Championship golf meet was held at the Hillcrest Country Club in Yankton, South Dakota; and WHEREAS, the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf Team had four golfers that placed in the top 70 out of 111 entries: Austin Boomsma won first place with a total score of 153 strokes; Carter Wells placed third with a total score of 158 strokes; Ryan Stahl placed twenty-eighth with a total score of 179 strokes; and Jevin Goertz placed sixty-first with a total score of 192 strokes; and WHEREAS, the James Valley Christian High School Varsity Golf Team received superior coaching and outstanding leadership from head coach Phelan Stahl: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature commends the James Valley Christian High School Boys Golf Team and its coaches on a great season.
